meanings.definition: Plans or drawings produced to show the look and function of something before it is made.
meanings.sent1: The architect's designs for the new building were detailed and colorful.
meanings.sent2: She studied the designs carefully before starting the construction.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful designs on the carpet with its claws made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a canvas where creative designs of all kinds came to life.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs on the ancient vase told a story of the past.

meanings.definition: Intends or plans to do something.
meanings.sent1: He designs to finish his homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: She designs to visit her friend next weekend.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel designs to gather as many acorns as possible before winter.
meanings.sent4: The captain designs to sail across the ocean despite the storm.
meanings.sent5: The student designs to excel in all subjects this semester.

meanings.definition: Patterns or arrangements created for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The intricate designs on the fabric were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: The floral designs on the wallpaper added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The chef's creative designs on the plate made the dish look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The intricate designs of the maze challenged the participants to find the exit.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs of the snowflakes sparkled in the sunlight.
